page.title: 03CHRISTIAN MALFORD CHURCH
page.content: SOME OF OUR CLASS VISITED THE CHURCH IN THE VILLAGE.IT IS CALLED ALL SAINTS.THE RECTOR IS LORD MILVERTON.I LIKED THE KNEELERS BECAUSE THEY HAD SOME INTERESTING PATTERNS ON THEM ONE OF THEM HAD A PICTURE OF TWO YELLOW KEYS CROSSED OVER.WE DREW SOME PICTURES OF THE WARDENS POLES AND WE HAD TO LOOK CAREFULLY ALL ROUNDTHE CHURCH.WE FOUND SOME STRANGE MARKS ON THE WALL, ONE LOOKED LIKE A SUN-THEY WERE PUT THERE BY THE MASONS WHO BUILT THE CHURCH.ALL THE PEWS ARE MADE OF WOOD AND I GUESSED 8 PEOPLE COULD SIT ON EACH ONE.WE LOOKED IN THE BELL TOWER ROOM BUT NO ONE RINGS THE BELLS NOW BECAUSE THEY'RE NOT SAFE
